profile:
Home-Pro Electric Inc is an electrical service and repair company, providing residential and commercial customers with the best same day service in the area since 1988. We guarantee the highest quality work, done right, to your satisfaction, or your money back. We're available for Emergency Service 24/7 and use Straight Forward (No Surprise) Pricing.

Some of the services we offer are: Panel Replacement, Service upgrades, Rewires, Knob and Tube replacement, Aluminum Wiring rejuvenation, expert troubleshooting and repair, Surge Protection, Home Energy Monitors, Pot lights, under-cabinet lighting, LED lighting, Electrical Inspections and code correction, Emergency Standby Generators, Electric Vehicle Charging Stations, Hot Tubs, Swimming Pools, Smoke Alarms/Detectors, Timers, Dimmers, Lighting, Kitchen renovations, Bathroom renovations, basement renovations, 

What Makes Us Different?

Straight Forward (No Surprise) Pricing™

You know the price before the work begins, in writing.

When something goes wrong with your electrical system, you want it fixed right away. Problems with your electrical system can be scary, stressful, expensive and even dangerous, but most electrical problems can be avoided with the right team on your side.

When our electrician arrives at your home for an electrical diagnosis and repair, he'll be ready for any electrical problem or situation. He will evaluate the problem or installation and explain all of the options available to you. Your electrician will then show you in writing exactly what the cost will be to perform the work. There will be no surprises after the work has been completed.

**Our Electricians

Our highly skilled electricians deliver expert installations every time. All employees are background checked, drug tested, and smoke free. We educate and train our employees in customer service, and to be knowledgeable and up to date regarding amendments to the electrical safety code, and ongoing product knowledge, so we may offer the best service possible to our customers.

All our electricians hold valid provincial Certificates of Qualification in the electrical trade. All employees are neat, uniformed and wear I.D. badges for your safety, security and peace of mind.

**Inside Your Home

Not only do we protect your home by providing electrical inspections and home protection plans, we also treat your home as though it was our own.

Our electricians will respect your home and property, with protection to your floors and furniture. You deserve this care, and we demand this from every technician we send out.

**Why We Are Here

To be focused on you, our customer. 
We strive to provide the best customer care and service possible. 
Educating our clients in electrical safety and awareness is of prime concern for us. We listen to our clients and are happy to provide any and all options and explain them thoroughly. This allows our clients to make an informed decision, one that is best for them and their family.
 We will promote electrical safety and awareness through continued education for our employees.
 We will continue to enhance the lives of our employees by providing a safe and secure work environment.

profile:
Service You Can Depend On
At Brella Electric we pride ourselves on providing our clients with quality work the first time. Our skilled and experienced electricians are knowledgeable and driven to provide service our clients are satisfied with. Please allow us to assist you with all your electrical needs and contact us today for a free estimate. 

Fair & Competitive Pricing
We pride ourselves on offering our clients fair pricing on our services. We are passionate about building trusted relationships with our clients and guarantee that they are being provided quality work at an affordable rate. 

Free At Home
Consultations
Before providing an estimate a member of our team will visit your location free of charge to discuss and plan up coming services.

Warranty 
We guarantee quality service with the utmost confidence. With this we offer our clients a 3 year warranty on all electrical services provided. If something needs to be fixed in this term we come back and fix it free of charge. 

Licensed & Insured
We are licensed/insured with the Electrical Safety Authority and WSIB,
